title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 250.4 - Director of PEPR and Director of Conciliation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 250.4 - Director of PEPR and Director of Conciliation

State Regulations

The term director of PEPR shall mean the agent of the board
designated as director of private employment practices and representation. The
term
director of conciliation
shall mean the agent of the
board so designated. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
250.4

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/10/2016

Renumbered from 250.3

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
